TEXT.TITLE: <SIME DARBY BHD> SIX MONTHS TO DECEMBER 31
TEXT.BODY: Shr 3.9 cents vs 4.2 cents Interim dividend three cents vs same Group net 35.8 mln ringgit vs 39.1 mln Pre-tax 77.3 mln vs 99.8 mln Turnover 1.16 billion vs 1.05 billion Note - dividend pay May 22, register April 24. REUTER
